Data Expected.Data Expected: genomics/omics (microarray, sequencing, aCGH, gene regulation, GWAS, Mass Spectrometry, CHiP, gene expression, genotyping)

Entry9.Description: Behavioral data from the UCSD Autism Center of Excellence.  This first data deposit will include Mullen Scales of Early Learning Scores from infants ages 12-36 months who are part of the ACE.  Infants represent those at risk for an ASD, language delay (LD) and developmental delay (DD).  Normal control data will be deposited as well.

Grant Information.Project Title: Biomarkers of Autism at 12 months: From Brain Overgrowth to Genes

Entry9.Investigators: Eric Courchesne, Karen Pierce and others.
